title-group.article-title: Paper published: Reference Management meets Web 2.0

body.p: Cellular Therapy and Transplantation today published my paper Reference Management meets Web 2.0. Regular readers of this blog probably know about most of the things I talk about in the paper, but I hope it is a good introduction for those new to reference management.

The paper wouldn’t be possible without FriendFeed, because Claudia Koltzenburg – the Managing Editor of the journal and regular contributor to FriendFeed – contacted me after one of our discussions there.
